title: Revionics’ Sixth Annual Customer Forum to Focus on Responsive Merchandising Models Enablement
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/29/2015 @ 3:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Revionics, Inc. 
AUSTIN, Texas -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Revionics, Inc. , a leading global provider of End-to-End Merchandise Optimization solutions , announced that Revionics’ Sixth Annual Customer Forum – Insight 2015 – will be held October 18-20, 2015 at the Omni Barton Creek in Austin, Texas. Attracting more than 150 retailers, industry luminaries and Revionics technology and channel partners from markets globally, this year’s forum is themed “Advantage: YOU.” The event is designed to help performance-driven retailers create a sustainable competitive advantage with a clear path to improved profits by leveraging pricing process automation, demand-responsive science and predictive analytics to enable a more responsive merchandising model. 
The Forum and Keynote Speakers: Forrester Research, Delhaize America, Lowes Foods Stores and FarmaCorp 
Attendees will experience educational sessions, peer and expert-led sessions, workshops, exciting networking opportunities and outings, and post-event customer certification training. This year’s forum features high-caliber expert speakers and topics including: Keynote Speaker: George Lawrie, Vice President and Principal Analyst, Forrester Research | Embracing Innovation in an Era of Faster Retailing and Seismic Disruptions General Session Speakers: Tim Concannon, Director of Pricing, Hannaford Supermarkets and Dan Harriman, Manager of Pricing Governance, Delhaize America | Moving to Modernization from Tactical to Strategic Price Optimization; Andres Valdivieso, CIO, FarmaCorp | ¡Ay, caramba! Conquering Pricing in Latin America; Tim Lowe, President, Lowes Foods Stores | Lowes Food Stores Puts ‘It’s All about the Brand’ as the Hallmark Strategy to Redefine the Rules of Shopper Engagement 
In addition, Lawrie will moderate an executive panel with Concannon, Valdivieso and Revionics Chief Science Officer Jeff Moore titled Unleashing the Power of Agile Pricing: Strategies to Get Started. 
“Revionics Insight is always a top-rate event for retailers, but 2015 provides the richest surround yet for leading retailers globally to learn, innovate and network,” said Marc Hafner, CEO of Revionics. “It promises to be a unique high-energy format that will give every attendee highly actionable insights and learnings that they can apply in their unique environments to drive enhanced margins and shopper loyalty.” 
Leading Partners Support Insight 2015: 
At Insight 2015, Revionics’ technology and service provider partners will be on hand to help retailers meet their business needs and solve their challenges while sharing their perspectives on how their offerings complement Revionics’ capabilities. This year’s lead sponsors include Title Sponsor Zebra Technologies , Platinum Sponsors RGIS , The Parker Avery Group , Price Revolution and Brand View , and Event Sponsors Strategix and XCCommerce .
